T02D3463:117b-1: ma h'a r'a dza l'i la manydzu shr'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3463:117b-3: 'jam dpal rgyal po chen po rol pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3463:117b-5: sngon ma bzhin du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs
T02D3463:117b-6: pa byas pa'i rjes su stong pa nyid du dmigs
T02D3463:117b-7: nas zla ba la gnas pa'i mam yig gi sa
T02D3463:117b-8: bon las skyes pa'i 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs sku
T02D3463:117b-9: mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3463:117b-10: gzhon nu zur phud lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D3463:117b-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3463:117b-12: phyag g-yon na autpa la bsnams pa /
T02D3463:117b-13: phyag g-yas pa rol pa'i stabs kyis seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D3463:117b-14: padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bdag nyid skad cig gis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3463:117b-15: de nas thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo dag dang
T02D3463:117b-16: ming med dag gis sen mo brten pa ni autpa
T02D3463:118a-0: aom w'a g'i shva ri mum @118a * //
T02D3463:118a-1: zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
